mean_en: a sign (such as …) used in printed text to show that words have been left out
sentence: Newspapers write their headlines in ellipsis because it\u0027s shorter. \"CRISIS AVERTED\" is better than \"THE CRISIS HAS BEEN AVERTED.\"
sentence_trans: 报纸用省略法写标题因为它更短。“危机转移”比“危机已经被转移” 好。
word_etyma: el\u003den进入 ＋ lipsis\u003dleave离开 → 进入离开的状态 → ellipsis省略
